trans-unit.source: Represents the cryptographic key and security algorithms that are used to generate a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于生成数字签名的加密密钥和安全算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials> class to specify the signing key, signing key identifier, and security algorithms that are used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to generate the digital signature for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials> 类指定 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 生成数字签名而使用的签名密钥、签名密钥标识符和安全算法。

trans-unit.source: To set the digital signature details, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.SigningCredentials%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置数字签名的详细信息，请设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.SigningCredentials%2A> 类的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />，它包含用于生成数字签名的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表示用于生成数字签名的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示加密算法的 URI，该加密算法用于计算要进行数字签名的 SOAP 消息部分的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the `signatureAlgorithm` and `digestAlgorithm` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 类指定 `signatureAlgorithm` 和 `digestAlgorithm` 参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class contains a set of static, constant strings that represent cryptographic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 类包含一组表示加密算法的静态常量字符串。

trans-unit.source: The members that have a `Signature` suffix can be used to specify the `signatureAlgoritm` parameter and the members that have a `Digest` suffix can be used to specify the `digestAlgorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 具有 `Signature` 后缀的成员可用于指定 `signatureAlgoritm` 参数，而具有 `Digest` 后缀的成员可用于指定 `digestAlgorithm` 参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />，它包含用于生成数字签名的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表示用于生成数字签名的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示加密算法的 URI，该加密算法用于计算要进行数字签名的 SOAP 消息部分的摘要。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> that specifies the identifier that represents the key that is used to create a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" />，指定表示用于创建数字签名的密钥的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the `signatureAlgorithm` and `digestAlgorithm` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 类指定 `signatureAlgorithm` 和 `digestAlgorithm` 参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class contains a set of static constant strings that represent cryptographic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 类包含一组表示加密算法的静态常量字符串。

trans-unit.source: The members that have a `Signature` suffix can be used to specify the `signatureAlgoritm` parameter and the members that have a `Digest` suffix can be used to specify the `digestAlgorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 具有 `Signature` 后缀的成员可用于指定 `signatureAlgoritm` 参数，而具有 `Digest` 后缀的成员可用于指定 `digestAlgorithm` 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取加密算法，该加密算法用于计算要进行数字签名的 SOAP 消息部分的摘要。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示加密算法的 URI，该加密算法用于计算要进行数字签名的 SOAP 消息部分的摘要。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.DigestAlgorithm%2A> property, use one of the constructors that take a `digestAlgorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.DigestAlgorithm%2A> 属性，请使用采用 `digestAlgorithm` 参数的构造函数之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于生成数字签名的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表示用于生成数字签名的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SignatureAlgorithm%2A> property, use one of the constructors that take a `signatureAlgorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SignatureAlgorithm%2A> 属性，请使用采用 `signatureAlgorithm` 参数的构造函数之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于生成数字签名的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />，它包含用于生成数字签名的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SigningKey%2A> property, use a constructor that takes a `signingKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SigningKey%2A> 属性，请使用采用 `signingKey` 参数的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier that represents the key that is used to create a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示用于创建数字签名的密钥的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> that specifies the identifier that represents the key that is used to create a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" />，指定表示用于创建数字签名的密钥的标识符。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SigningKeyIdentifier%2A> property, use the constructor that takes a `signingKeyIdentifier` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials.SigningKeyIdentifier%2A> 属性，请使用采用 `signingKeyIdentifier` 参数的构造函数。
